content: swirly smooshy chunky beanie by karin maxey do you need a hat… yesterday this swirly little beanie knits up nice and quick thanks to fat yarn and big needles it stays snugly on your head and keeps you toasty warm this hat also makes excellent last-minute christmas knitting for all your friends techniques this is a great pattern for an advanced beginner or beyond skills required cast on knit in the round knit knit 2 together knit 3 together do a yarn over and weave in ends materials yarn 85 yards 75 meters malabrigo rasta 100% merino wool 90 yards/82 meters per 150 g skein or other super bulky yarn 5-6 wpi sample in photo uses colorway verde azul this pattern looks extra snazzy with a variegated yarn needle us 13/9 0mm circular needles 32 or longer for magic loop or size needed to obtain gauge checking the gauge is very important to achieve a good fit do not skip this step notions tapestry needle scissors gauge 2 5 stitches and 3 row per 1 in garter stitch before blocking sizes adult small medium large yields a hat with circumference of approximately 19 2 21 5 24 brim body cast on 48 54 60 sts and join using magic loop rounds 6-26 yo k2tog repeat to end until hat method be careful not to twist as you join measures 7 8 8 5 sizing tip to adjust the size of the hat add or crown subtract multiples of 3 stitches remember for each round 1 k2tog repeat to end 3 stitches you add/subtract that will change the hat round 2 yo k2tog repeat to end size approximately 1 the brim needs to be an round 3 k2tog repeat to end if your stitches aren t even number of stitches to make the ribbing work in multiples of 3 at the end of the row you can so you may have to m1 in the first round to get to a either k3tog or k2tog + k1 at the end of the round if multiple of 3 sts for the body of the hat you need to round 4 k2tog repeat to end rounds 1-5 k1 p1 repeat to end of row cut yarn and pull it through remaining stitches use **if you want the ribbing to flow into the pattern your tapestry needle to weave in the ends if you re twist the knit stitch in the ribbing then on the first feeling fancy and want to use up extra yarn add a row of the pattern knit the first stitch and slip it pompom back onto the previous needle before starting the yo k2tog pattern questions comments feedback get in touch ravelry @kneadsandknits and always in stitches designs ig
